title: Parvati_j
author: Parvati_j
content: Hello, greetings to you all, I recently created this account in this forum, so I decided to come to our local conversation board to ask for professional advice on how to go through this forum, because it seems like a very good learning environment to me so I can broaden my knowledge on crypto, though I have little amount of knowledge on crypto(bitcoin to be precise) but I am not satisfied, I intend to know more and I think this is the right place.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Quote from: Parvati_j on October 05, 2023, 06:43:27 PMHello, greetings to you all, I recently created this account in this forum, so I decided to come to our local conversation board to ask for professional advice on how to go through this forum, because it seems like a very good learning environment to me so I can broaden my knowledge on crypto, though I have little amount of knowledge on crypto(bitcoin to be precise) but I am not satisfied, I intend to know more and I think this is the right place.Hi Parvati_j,Welcome to the forum and the Indian local board. Well, you can go through the different boards in the forum and read the pinned messages to get accustomed to rules and regulations. That would take a lot of your time therefore you can go through the below list and hopefully you will gain the information you are seeking here. Another piece of advice from me to you would be to stay active and ask questions whenever you need an answer. Bitcoin Resources - Consolidate List (India Specific)Merit & new rank requirementsUnofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQA short introduction to the Trust SystemBeginners & Help Encyclopedia

comments.author: pawanjain
comments.body: Welcome to the forum. You have come to the right place to increase your knowledge in the crypto domain.We already have a pinned post which contains a lot of sources to enrich your knowledge.Other than the list provided by @pakhitheboss  you can also utilize these resources as per your interest.Bitcoin Resources - Consolidate List (India Specific) v2.O

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Welcome to the bitcoin community Parvati_j,I think the ratio of Female bitcoiner is less than males, congratulations to being the rare one.@pakhitheboss had provided a good list to know the rules about forumHereIt's good that you discovered the Indian local board early, In my case I discovered it after 10days of registering, mostly started threads on Global boards.

comments.author: Parvati_j
comments.body: Thanks to you all for the wonderful comments and guide to strengthen my knowledge On how this forum works, i really appreciate. Thanks cafter for the kind words.

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Quote from: Parvati_j on October 08, 2023, 10:04:03 AMThanks to you all for the wonderful comments and guide to strengthen my knowledge On how this forum works, i really appreciate. Thanks cafter for the kind words.I want to share a new feature of the forum with you, Because, I also discovered it today while writing a reply and rereading it.I don’t know if this is a new feature or if this feature was already available on the forum. I didn’t even notice this feature when I joined the forum a while back.This feature is about how to quickly edit our reply/post after posting it, you will see a icon like this  in the right side of posted thread.Here is a full image of it:

comments.author: Parvati_j
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 08, 2023, 10:58:54 AMQuote from: Parvati_j on October 08, 2023, 10:04:03 AMThanks to you all for the wonderful comments and guide to strengthen my knowledge On how this forum works, i really appreciate. Thanks cafter for the kind words.I want to share a new feature of the forum with you, Because, I also discovered it today while writing a reply and rereading it.I don’t know if this is a new feature or if this feature was already available on the forum. I didn’t even notice this feature when I joined the forum a while back.This feature is about how to quickly edit our reply/post after posting it, you will see a icon like this  in the right side of posted thread.Here is a full image of it: I just tried it and it's cool, its better and faster when compared to using the edit button.again thanks cafter you have been helpful,

comments.author: 2double0
comments.body: Hello Parvati_jNice to see you joining the Indian community after roaming around on the forum, trying to learn new things. While everyone is serving you with the best threads to look for, I am also sharing some important threads for your experience to become seamless. I hope you find these threads very detailed with all the important stuff you need to know to become a useful member of this community.List of useful Threads![overview] LoyceV's useful data on Bitcointalk(Table) All Lightning Network Threads In One Place[GUIDES] on Bitcointalk. Index thread (until there is a dedicated subforum?)Newbies can now pay a small fee to enable images

comments.author: Parvati_j
comments.body: Quote from: 2double0 on October 09, 2023, 01:10:54 PMHello Parvati_jNice to see you joining the Indian community after roaming around on the forum, trying to learn new things. While everyone is serving you with the best threads to look for, I am also sharing some important threads for your experience to become seamless. I hope you find these threads very detailed with all the important stuff you need to know to become a useful member of this community.List of useful Threads![overview] LoyceV's useful data on Bitcointalk(Table) All Lightning Network Threads In One Place[GUIDES] on Bitcointalk. Index thread (until there is a dedicated subforum?)Newbies can now pay a small fee to enable imagesWow these links are very useful, thats so thoughtful of you to bring up these wonderfullinks, I am really impressed with the generous act of members in this our local board, I never thought I'll find enough help from member but you guys kept on proving selflessness, thanks 2double0

comments.author: 2double0
comments.body: Quote from: Parvati_j on October 09, 2023, 03:40:39 PMQuote from: 2double0 on October 09, 2023, 01:10:54 PMSNIPWow these links are very useful, thats so thoughtful of you to bring up these wonderfullinks, I am really impressed with the generous act of members in this our local board, I never thought I'll find enough help from member but you guys kept on proving selflessness, thanks 2double0I am happy to see that you found the links useful.We will all be more than happy to help if you need anything except from learning about this forum. Grow your account, contribute to the community, earn merits and some day you will also be able to get enrolled in signature campaigns and get rewarded for your contribution.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 08, 2023, 10:58:54 AMQuote from: Parvati_j on October 08, 2023, 10:04:03 AMThanks to you all for the wonderful comments and guide to strengthen my knowledge On how this forum works, i really appreciate. Thanks cafter for the kind words.I want to share a new feature of the forum with you, Because, I also discovered it today while writing a reply and rereading it.I don’t know if this is a new feature or if this feature was already available on the forum. I didn’t even notice this feature when I joined the forum a while back.This feature is about how to quickly edit our reply/post after posting it, you will see a icon like this  in the right side of posted thread.Here is a full image of it: Lol, I have been here for years yet learned about it from your post  @op just stay active and all knowledge will find it's way to you. Edit: You may use this quote/mention telegram bot, you will find it handy: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5248878.0Whenever someone mentions your name, quotes your post, merits your post you will get notification on telegram.
